item.title: Hello, World!
item.description:
The world certainly does not need another tech blog. Nor do I necessarily have many particularly insightful or revolutionary thoughts. But the beauty of the internet is that everyone has a chance to scream into the void, regardless of the quality of their work or veracity of their claims.

With that being said, I’ve spent countless hours reading others’ thoughtsâ€”obscure tutorials, random notes on niche problems, strangers’ opinions on the internet. I’ve always appreciated this vast ocean of information in the technology and software spaces, and I feel compelled to contribute to it, in whatever inconsequential way that might be.
